APS_TcMode_t Struct Reference

The type used to specify if the device is a trust center and what type of the trust center, if it is indeed a trust center. More...

#include <aps.h>

Detailed Description

The type used to specify if the device is a trust center and what type of the trust center, if it is indeed a trust center.
